scripts.bundle: rm -rf build && mkdir build && react-native esbuild-bundle --bundle-output ./build/index.bundle --assets-dest ./build
scripts.postinstall: DESTINATION='node_modules/react-native-esbuild' LIB_FILE=`cd .. && echo \`pwd\`/\`npm pack\`` && (rm -rf $DESTINATION || true) && mkdir $DESTINATION && tar -xvzf $LIB_FILE -C $DESTINATION --strip-components 1 && rm $LIB_FILE
